site_name: Footpath OffDitton RoadSurbitonKT6 6RF
description: Installation of mast and supporting apparatus
decision_conditions: The proposed telecoms equipment by virtue of its siting and appearance and in particular its height would result in an incongruous addition to the streetscene that would be visually intrusive and create visual clutter and would not be in keeping with but detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 37 (Overheating) of planning permission 17/14178/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
Please confirm if a new application has been submitted and if so, please withdraw this current application or submit a revised application form
